title: How to Make Squid Teriyaki

steps.headline: Prepare the skewers.
steps.description: Allow them to soak in a pan of water for at least 30 minutes. This avoids any burning or charring when you place them on the grill.

steps.headline: Create the teriyaki sauce.
steps.description: In a large bowl, mix the soy sauce, mirin, 1/2 cup water, and sugar together. Pour about half of the sauce in a small bowl.

steps.headline: Marinate the squid.
steps.description: Add the squid in the large bowl for about an hour.

steps.headline: Pierce the squid onto the skewers.
steps.description: Discard any marinade that the squid has touched.

steps.headline: Make the teriyaki baste.
steps.description: Add the reserved teriyaki sauce to a saucepan and place it over a medium high heat. Add the cornstarch and 1 teaspoon water to the mixture when it starts to boil. Remove from the heat once it thickens.

steps.headline: Grill the squid.
steps.description: Use the teriyaki baste while cooking, 2 to 3 minutes on each side until it turns a dark brown color.

steps.headline: Serve the squid on top of a bed of rice.
steps.description: Drizzle any remaining teriyaki baste on top.

text: Prepare the skewers. Allow them to soak in a pan of water for at least 30 minutes. This avoids any burning or charring when you place them on the grill. Create the teriyaki sauce. In a large bowl, mix the soy sauce, mirin, 1/2 cup water, and sugar together. Pour about half of the sauce in a small bowl. Marinate the squid. Add the squid in the large bowl for about an hour. Pierce the squid onto the skewers. Discard any marinade that the squid has touched. Make the teriyaki baste. Add the reserved teriyaki sauce to a saucepan and place it over a medium high heat. Add the cornstarch and 1 teaspoon water to the mixture when it starts to boil. Remove from the heat once it thickens. Grill the squid. Use the teriyaki baste while cooking, 2 to 3 minutes on each side until it turns a dark brown color. Serve the squid on top of a bed of rice. Drizzle any remaining teriyaki baste on top.
